title: Does anyone know what font is used for msn games?
content:
I need to know what the font is for the “games” part in this logo...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328225811im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo_MSNGames_4346.jpg)

 [‹ (x) "Geography of Thought" (2003) book text face - Berling {Kristian M}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328225811/http:/typophile.com/node/43589 "Go to previous forum topic") [IR Magazine typefaces ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328225811/http:/typophile.com/node/43636 "Go to next forum topic")
author: alyssamunaretto

comments.content:
I think it might be one of the new Vista fonts — [Segoe](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328225811/http:/neosmart.net/gallery/v/apps/fonts/Segoe+UI.png.html).

- Mike Yanega
